title: Riot Points!
body: During the leveling up process, we hardly get any Riot Points. Isn't it time we get some, after all these hours and days dedicating time to this game?

replies.body: yeah and you should start with all champs and skins and be given a free rank each week
Riot should also give away free champs to summoners who have played an un-owned champ more than 10 times, or so.

Firstly, IP is free. Spend it on champions, runes or rune pages.

Secondly, Hextech crafting was created as a sort of free RP thing, in which you can get champions, skins and ward skins.
